description.english: Locate all A‑Force members to aid you on the A‑Force table. (Single player only)
description.german: Finde alle A‑Force-Mitglieder, damit sie dir am Tisch A‑Force helfen. (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Localisez tous les membres de l'A‑Force pour vous aider sur le plateau A‑Force. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Trova tutti i membri della A‑Force nel tavolo A‑Force. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Localiza a todas las integrantes de A‑Force para que te ayuden en la mesa A‑Force. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Use the Cosmic Cube to defeat the Soviet Madame Masque on the A‑Force table. (Single player only)
description.german: Siege mit dem Kosmischen Würfel über die sowjetische Madame Masque am Tisch A‑Force. (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Utilisez le Cube Cosmique pour vaincre la Madame Masque soviétique sur A‑Force. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Usa il Cubo Cosmico per sconfiggere la Madame Masque sovietica in A‑Force. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Usa el Cubo Cósmico para vencer a la Madame Masque soviética en la mesa A‑Force. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Get Bombshell in play with her ramp on Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Single player only)
description.german: Bring Bombshell mittels ihrer Rampe ins Spiel in Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Mettez Bombshell en jeu avec sa rampe sur Marvel's Women of Power: Champions. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Fai apparire Bombshell colpendo la sua rampa in Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Haz venir a Bombshell con su rampa en Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Lock 3 balls for Squirrel Girl's mode on Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Single player only)
description.german: Arretiere 3 Kugeln für den Modus Squirrel Girl in Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Bloquez 3 billes pour Squirrel Girl sur Marvel's Women of Power: Champions. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Blocca 3 palline per la modalità Squirrel Girl in Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Bloquea 3 bolas para el modo Squirrel Girl en Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Reach level five on the Fallout® Pinball table. (Single player only)
description.german: Erreiche Stufe 5 am Tisch Fallout® Pinball. (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 5 sur le plateau Fallout® Pinball. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello cinque nel tavolo Fallout® Pinball. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel cinco en la mesa de pinball Fallout®. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Defeat a boss enemy on the Fallout® Pinball table. (Single player only)
description.german: Besiege einen Endgegner am Tisch Fallout® Pinball. (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Battez un ennemi boss sur le plateau Fallout® Pinball. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss nemico nel tavolo Fallout® Pinball. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe enemigo en la mesa de pinball Fallout®. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Defeat a dragon on The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim® Pinball table! (Single player only)
description.german: Besiege einen Drachen am Flippertisch The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim®! (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Battez un dragon sur le plateau The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim® Pinball ! (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Sconfiggi un drago nel tavolo The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim® Pinball! (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a un dragón en la mesa de pinball The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim®! (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Complete the main quests on The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim® Pinball table! (Single player only)
description.german: Absolviere die Haupt-Quests am Flippertisch The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim®! (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Terminez les quêtes principales sur le plateau The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim® ! (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Completa le missioni principali in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim® Pinball! (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: ¡Completa las misiones principales en la mesa The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim®! (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Blast away your enemies with the BFG on DOOM® Pinball. (Single player only)
description.german: Zerblase deine Gegner mit der BFG in DOOM® Pinball. (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Détruisez vos ennemis avec le BFG sur DOOM® Pinball. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Annienta i tuoi nemici con il BFG in DOOM® Pinball. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Aniquila a tus enemigos con la BFG en DOOM® Pinball. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Face and defeat the Cyberdemon on Nightmare difficulty on DOOM® Pinball. (Single player only)
description.german: Stelle und besiege den Cyberdämon im Albtraum-Schwierigkeitsgrad in DOOM® Pinball. (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Affrontez et battez le Cyberdémon en difficulté Cauchemar sur DOOM® Pinball. (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Affronta e sconfiggi il Cyberdemone a difficoltà Incubo in DOOM® Pinball. (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: Enfréntate y vence al Ciberdemonio en dificultad Pesadilla en DOOM® Pinball. (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Complete Krennic's Wrath on level 2 on Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™ table! (Single player only)
description.german: Absolviere Krennics Zorn auf Stufe 2 am Tisch Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™! (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Terminez la Colère de Krennic au niveau 2 sur Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™ ! (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Completa L'ira di Krennic al livello 2 in Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™! (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: ¡Completa Furia de Krennic en nivel 2 en la mesa Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™! (Solo un jugador)

description.english: Collect a Super Jackpot on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™ table! (Single player only)
description.german: Kassiere einen Super-Jackpot am Tisch Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™! (Nur Einzelsp.)
description.french: Récupérez un Super Jackpot sur le plateau Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™ ! (1 joueur seulement)
description.italian: Ottieni un super jackpot nel tavolo Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™! (Un giocatore)
description.spanish: ¡Consigue un superpremio en la mesa Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™! (Solo un jugador)
